title: PM Modi urges Indian automotive industry to embrace best practices for sustainable growth
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi urged the automotive industry to adopt global best practices and focus on green and clean mobility. Addressing the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers' annual convention, he emphasized the sector's role in driving economic growth and highlighted India's investment in future-ready infrastructure to ensure shared benefits of growth.
